mapper.update: UPDATE ${table} SET word_no = #{quizNo}, question = #{question}, timer = #{timer}, hint1 = #{hint1}, hint2 = #{hint2}, hint3 = #{hint3}, answer = #{answer}, category_no = #{categoryNo} WHERE word_no = #{quizNo};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ${table} ORDER BY quizNo LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
